messages.content: How can you export your Kaggle username and token for using the ComfyUI-Gemma node?

To export your Kaggle username and token for using the ComfyUI-Gemma node, you should use the following shell commands: `export KAGGLE_USERNAME='fles123'` and `export KAGGLE_KEY='cb8421571d5d0e29f0564b5a9b105405'`. These commands will store your username and token in the environment variables.
